entry.title: On-Line Useful Web Tools
entry.content:
There’s a lot of on-line tools for every kind of needs. I know few of them, but here I wish to resume some of these particularly useful for developers:

Name Category Comment
Free Formatter Formatter, Validator Format, Validate, Convert Json, Xml, Html string so you can reasonably read it. C
JSON … JSON Formatter& validator, JsonPath tester, JsonSelect tester
Google Fonts Web Fonts A tool to search, select and import link to web fonts. With load evaluation. Amazing.
HLS Picker Color picker Simple and powerful tool to obtain color code from settings its property
